price: Todo ser humano tiene designado un ángel protector que registra sus obras.
arabic: إِن كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ لَّمَّا عَلَيۡهَا حَافِظٞ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: in kullu nafsin lammā ʿalayhā ḥāfiẓun
